extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Products and Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is using any of the affected products or versions listed under CVE-2023-4863 and CVE-2023-5217.

extracted_playbook.condition: Are any affected products or versions in use?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Affected Products
extracted_playbook.description: Update all affected products to the latest versions available to mitigate the vulnerabilities CVE-2023-4863 and CVE-2023-5217.

affected_products: Chromium-based browsers like Microsoft Edge, Brave, Opera, and Vivaldi
Other software using the libwebp library, including Honeyview, Affinity, Gimp, Inkscape, LibreOffice, Telegram, ffmpeg, and various Android and cross-platform apps built with Flutter
Firefox products as specified in SA2023-066
Other Chromium related projects depending on the libvpx library
